column4: Hi guys, could you please help me i am getting an error when trying to install from package manger - i get sub process /usr/bin dpkg returned an error code (2)
when i try to run from terminal i get "E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavailable)
E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), is another process using it?

2010-07-19T22:09:00.000Z	Dazzler		any know what is causing that?
2010-07-19T22:10:00.000Z	PigeonCluster	Dazzler	do you have synaptic open?
2010-07-19T22:10:00.000Z	Dazzler		i dont have any other install in process i have booted my machine up and tried to install this from Synaptic Package Manager
2010-07-19T22:11:00.000Z	PigeonCluster	Dazzler	do you have synaptic *open*?
2010-07-19T22:11:00.000Z	PigeonCluster	Dazzler	wait don't try what ubottu said yet
2010-07-19T22:11:00.000Z	Dazzler		this was the first thing i tried to do
2010-07-19T22:11:00.000Z	PigeonCluster	Dazzler	you don't have anything at all open? you sure? if you do and you run that it will break something quietly.
2010-07-19T22:11:00.000Z	Dazzler	PigeonCluster	yes i have Synaptic open
2010-07-19T22:11:00.000Z	PigeonCluster	Dazzler	close that silly.
2010-07-19T22:12:00.000Z	PigeonCluster		we asked you that three or four times ...
2010-07-19T22:12:00.000Z	Dazzler	PigeonCluster	can i not run the install from there?
2010-07-19T22:12:00.000Z	Dazzler	PigeonCluster	i first tried that then ran the command from the terminal
2010-07-19T22:12:00.000Z	PigeonCluster	Dazzler	welll .... wait, are you trying to install on the command line, or in synaptic? if you're trying to use synaptic, then close synaptic, run the command ubottu said, then open synaptic again
2010-07-19T22:13:00.000Z	Dazzler		sorry i am really new to linux
2010-07-19T22:13:00.000Z	Dazzler	PigeonCluster	yes i first tried snaptic which didnt work so tried to run a command in the terminal which again didnt work
2010-07-19T22:13:00.000Z	PigeonCluster	Dazzler	sorry, my work break is up, back to coding
2010-07-19T22:25:00.000Z	Dazzler		i have fixed my problem but thanks for your help
2010-07-19T22:26:00.000Z	Dazzler	PigeonCluster	thanks for your help i have resolved my problem.
